111131.content:
Rebecca decided she'd sit down to have a better look of her feet. As she sat down however, she felt the buildings under her collapse under her weight. The people inside screamed as her butt became the last thing they saw before they all got crushed. She shrugged and watched as the people below at her feet ran frantic, trying to figure out a way to escape the city. She felt what it was like to have power, and it felt great! Lifting her foot, she slammed it back down upon the innocent, feeling the squirts of blood on her dirt-caked soles. She felt her stomach rumble and got an idea.

"As you can hear, I'm really hungry right now. What's there to eat?" She grinned at the crowd of people, licking her lips. This sent a new level of frenzy in the town. "Oh, I know!" She reached down and grabbed a handful of people from the street. "In you go!" She giggled and tilted her head back, dropping thousands of people into her awaiting mouth. Once they were all in, she closed it and chewed thoughtfully. She could taste the crunch of their bones and the gushing of their blood on her tongue. It sent her into a fit of ecstacy. "I never knew you all tasted so good," she moaned in pleasure.

That's when she saw probably 8,000 people on the roof of a skyscraper. She watched as a man on a platform there started checking his microphone. "Hi," she smiled, and waved.

The man jumped when he heard her, but waved back. "Is...is this thing working?" He tapped the microphone, and spoke into it again. "Hello, I'm the founder of the vore community in this town. When I was a boy, I always wanted to be eaten by a teen girl such as yourself." He coughed, but resumed. "I don't know why, but that has always been my fantasy. That's why I made a vore group to meet with individuals like myself. As you can see, it has boomed over the last couple of years." He pointed to all of those people on the roof with him. "When I saw you as a giant, I alerted everyone to come up here to this roof to make their fantasy of being eaten come true." He blushed. "Will you do that for us?"

Rebecca beamed at him. "Of course! There's always room for more." She patted her still famished stomach. "Come on in." She laid her head on the roof and opened her mouth wide-open. All of the people there couldn't wait and rushed towards her. She giggled as she felt their feet on her tongue. Once she got a mouthful, she closed her mouth and swallowed all of them whole. She felt them down her neck and then down to her stomach acids. Aroused, she grabbed a handful of people from the crowd and shoved them in her mouth. She could hear the people on the roof cheer and some of them quaking in fear. Mouthful by mouthful, she swallowed them all until the leader of the group was left.

"My, my, I have never seen anything as beautiful as you." He took off his hat and kneeled. "It would be a pleasure to be devoured by you, Mistress."

She blushed. "Aww, you're so sweet. You sure you want to go with this? You seem like a nice guy."

He pondered this. "You know, I've been dreaming this my whole life. It would only make sense for me to fullfill my dreams."

"Good point." She tapped her finger on her chin. "I still think you're too nice to be eaten by me. Tell you what, I can put you in my mouth whenever you want, but I'll won't swallow you. Want to come with?"

He cracked a smile. "Sounds good to me. Sure, I'll come."

"Great!" She grabbed him and thought about where to put him. "Hey, you have any idea where I can place you? I don't have any pockets."

"Well..."

114111.content:
Uh, man. What did I just say? What am I doing? Something doesn't feel right.

She gently plucked the boy out from between her boobs and placed him in her open palm. He gave her a week smile, but Rebecca could almost feel him shaking in spite of his size.

"Sorry Noah, I'm feeling kind of weird. The past few minutes I've felt weird... I don't feel myself."

"Y-yeah, I mean that makes sense all things considered."

Rebecca chuckled. This kid's smart for his age. She scanned the horizon for whatever made her grow, but she saw nothing. She looked to the left and right of her and saw only a few stragglers running from the beach. She let out a long sigh. Then in an attempt to take her mind off of her terrible current circumstances, she looked back at the orphan boy in the middle of her palm.

He looked like some kind of emo anime character with his slightly too long black hair, a lot of it covering his eyes. Almost instinctively, Rebecca reached out one, pink-nailed finger and brushed the hair out of his face. Noah flinched at first, but then started to lean into her finger after she had finished, like a dog wanting to get rubbed. How much attention could an orphan possibly get? Maybe he had people taking care of him, but how many people actually showed him affection? A smile escaped her lips as Noah continued to rub against her finger. It was so cute and tragic that she had to hold back tears. She began to run her finger through his hair and brought him closer to her face. He seemed to be shaking less.

"So what's an orphan doing on the beach this time of day?"

"I ran away," he replied. "I didn't know where else to go, but I couldn't go back to that orphanage."

"Was it really that bad?"

Noah looked away. "I don't want to talk about it."

Rebecca ran her finger down his back, attempting to comfort him. She wanted to give him the biggest hug that she could, but that would probably crush him.

"So you ran away from an orphanage, towards the beach, and towards a girl who is now suddenly the size of a small building. Didn't anybody warn you about strangers? Aren't you scared of me?"

"Yeah, I'm a little scared. But in all the fairy tales, the girl giants are always the nice ones."

"Well Noah, I'm Rebecca. I guess I'm one of the nice giants now."

Noah looked up at Rebecca.

"Can I stay with you?"

"I don't know what I'm gonna do now, but for the time being you definitely can," Rebecca's grin grew, "I've always wanted a little pet."

"YAAAAAY! I'VE GOT A BIG SISTER!" Noah yelled out as he suddenly got up, ran to the edge of Rebecca's palm, and jumped onto the bridge of her nose, bear hugging it. Rebecca was completely caught off-guard, but adjusted her hand to pin him to her nose and hold back her hysterical laughter. She stuck her left hand back to catch herself from falling backward.

Suddenly she heard a loud crashing sound not too far behind her, on her right side. A trash can had been knocked over by someone.

Emma...no, not the Watson.She doesn't like being mis-identified.I'm talking of the popular,most happening,charming and vivacious Emma L.Bedfield. I know I'm exaggerating and comp,etely misconceptualised...for the world. Actually she fits none of the criteria to be considered a normal human being with a primal instinct of mating.
She is a boring twelfth grader desperately waitineg to go to college, willingly drowning in the sea of knowledge, overweight but still attractive,single and ofcourse virgin!!!! So you see how uncool she is.The only thing cool about her is her chef-like skills.She bakes marvellous Runny chocolate brownies!!! and banana fruit cake and oh my my her meatballs are worth being dying for..
A tinge of excitement in her not-so-cool life.Despite what people of her age group think of her and her down-the-drain social life,her family loves her.And me...I am Rollie..her imaginary friend and sure I do exist!!!
She told me that cooking reminds her of magic potions,charms and hexes, the immortal potion, the love potion, and yes the sleeping potion which had put her beloved Snow White to a never-ending sleep...and she woke up from a beautiful dream where a prince charming kissed her on the lips!!!!!
Every morning Em makes herself a black tea not because she loves it or that its a part of her tight schedule actually she's experimenting.Whenever she prepares herself a cup of tea she adds something new to the concoction or just adjusts the quantities of ingredients.She has been doing this for about a month.I think its dumb and what's the point???She doesn't even like it???And when I asked her what does she think she wants out of the varying recipes???She said-"Who knows may be I find a new potion to make you visible!!! So today the alteration she made was bit unusual,she added

155221.content: "Come on Amy," her scientist boyfriend, Ray, pressured, "if this works, I'll be winning that science fair hands down, maybe even the Nobel Peace Prize," "but you haven't even tested it on lab animals or even vegetables for that matter," Amy said, still not trusting what essentally looked like a cryogentic tube except it glowed with a green ominious green light, "and even assuming it does work, how will you shink me back to normal," "I'll figure something out," Ray told her, "NO THEN," Amy yelled, "there is NO WAY I'm getting into that thing," "not even in the name of science," Ray asked, "NO," Amy yelled as she was about to storm out but Ray grabbed her arm, "let me go Ray," "sorry Amy," Ray told her, "I love you but my heart belongs to science," as he threw her into the open tube, which closed the minute she slammed into the back, "FOR SCIENCE," Ray yelled as he powered up the machine. The machine hummed loudly as the lights began to spin, Amy was becoming disoriented by everything that was happening when the chamber filled with a green gas that made her cough, "what was that," when the machine hummed down and the door opened as Amy fell out disoriented. "You okay Amy," Ray asked as she sat up, "I'm fine no thanks to you," Amy said in anger as she stood up when all of a sudden, she felt a strange tingling sensation all over her body, when all of a sudden, she began to grow bigger and bigger, 10 feet, 20 feet, 30 feet contining untl she was 50 feet tall too bad her clothes didn't though her black swimsuit managed to, "EUREKA," Ray shrieked excitely "THIS IS AMAZING, MY GROWTH MACHINE WORKS, NOW I CAN HELP END WORLD HUNGER," when Amy grabbed him, "I'm a 50 foot freak and all you think about is your experiment," she yelled in anger, "but sweetie," Ray said as looked into her eyes, "don't sweetie me you jerk," Amy yelled, her eyes filled with murderous rage, "but it was a success," Ray yelled giddy, not concerned with the fact that his girlfriend is 50 feet tall and pissed at him, "my growh ray works," "you know what," Amy said as she put him down, "fine, if that's how it is, consider us broken up," as she stood up and walked away, shaking the ground with each step, contemplating what to do to blow off steam.

15531222212.content:
Holly activated the machine and stepped into it's beam. At the prearranged time, six minutes for saturation, the machine shut off. Holly stepped off the pad and went upstairs.

Suddenly, she was real hungry. She went to work making sandwiches for herself emptying the frig of it's lunch meat. She made six large sandwiches and ate them all then she poured milk for herself until the milk was gone.

She didn't think anything of it because her research had prepared her for this. She knew that a ravenous appetite would be the result of exposure to the beam.

For two days she went about living, doing the same things she had always done. At dawn of the third day her appetite remained and she noted this thinking that it was interesting but not world-shaking.

On the fifth day she wrote it down recording everything that had happened. That night she went to sleep and awoke the the next morning feeling cramped. She tried to spread out and discovered that her feet were protruding past the foot of the bed. She could feel the cold against her toes.
